com.espertech.esper.jmx.client

Class JMXEndpointConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.jmx.client.JMXEndpointConfiguration

  • public class JMXEndpointConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for the JMX endpoint.

    A configuration can be loaded from a properties file via the #load method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CREATE_LISTENER_MBEAN
      The property name for the flag to create statement listener mbeans.
      static java.lang.String CREATE_NAMED_WINDOW_MBEAN
      The property name for the flag to create named window mbeans.
      static java.lang.String CREATE_STATEMENT_MBEAN
      The property name for the flag to create statement mbeans.
      static java.lang.String DOMAIN_NAME
      The property name for the domain name to override the default.
      static java.lang.String NUM_NOTIFICATION_THREADS
      The property name for the number of notification threads.
      static java.lang.String RMI_REGISTRY_PORT
      The property name for the RMI registry port.
      static java.lang.String SERVER_MANAGMEMT_ONLY
      Boolean setting to indicate that none of Esper domain objects are managed.
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_URL
      The property name for the service URL.
      static java.lang.String USE_PLATFORM_MBEAN_SERVER
      The property name for the flag to use the JVM platform mbean server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JMXEndpointConfiguration()
      Ctor, sets default configuration options.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectorConfig getConnectorConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration to use for creating a new JMX connector or using an existing JMX connector.
      java.lang.String getCustomMBeanServerDomain()
      Returns the mbean server domain to use for the mbean server, or null or empty string to use the default value, @see JMXEndpoint.DEFAULT_MBS_DOMAIN.
      int getNumNotificationThreads()
      Returns the number of threads in the threadpool to process notifications.
      boolean isCreateNamedWindowMBean()
      Returns true for the EsperJMX to create mbeans for named windows, or false if EsperJMX does not create mbeans for named windows.
      boolean isCreateStmtListenerMBean()
      Returns true for the EsperJMX to create mbeans for statement listeners, or false if EsperJMX does not create mbeans for statement listeners.
      boolean isCreateStmtMBean()
      Returns true for the EsperJMX to create mbeans for statements, or false if EsperJMX does not create mbeans for statements.
      static JMXEndpointConfiguration load(java.util.Properties properties)
      Load configuration from properties.
      void setConnectorConfiguration(ConnectorConfig connectorConfiguration)
      Sets the configuration to use for creating a new JMX connector or using an existing JMX connector.
      void setCreateNamedWindowMBean(boolean createNamedWindowMBean)
      Set true for the EsperJMX to create mbeans for named windows, or false if EsperJMX does not create mbeans for named windows.
      void setCreateStmtListenerMBean(boolean createStmtListenerMBean)
      Set to true for the EsperJMX to create mbeans for statement listeners, or false if EsperJMX does not create mbeans for statement listeners.
      void setCreateStmtMBean(boolean createStmtMBean)
      Set to true for the EsperJMX to create mbeans for statements, or false if EsperJMX does not create mbeans for statements.
      void setCustomMBeanServerDomain(java.lang.String customMBeanServerDomain)
      Overrides the default domain, which is defined in JMXEndpoint.DEFAULT_MBS_DOMAIN.
      void setNumNotificationThreads(int numNotificationThreads)
      Sets the number of threads in the threadpool to process notifications.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static final java.lang.String SERVER_MANAGMEMT_ONLY

        Constant Field Values

      • load

        public static JMXEndpointConfiguration load(java.util.Properties properties)
                                     throws ConfigurationException
        Load configuration from properties.

        Valid property named are defined by this class.

        Parameters:
        properties - to parse
        Returns:
        configuration object
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the properties cannot be parsed
